summary.span: 表示一系列相互连接的直线和曲线。

span.span: Represents a series of connected lines and curves.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序使用路径绘制形状的轮廓、 填充的形状的内部和创建剪辑区域。Applications use paths to draw outlines of shapes, fill the interiors of shapes, and create clipping regions. 图形引擎会保留世界坐标空间在路径中的几何形状的坐标。The graphics engine maintains the coordinates of geometric shapes in a path in world coordinate space. 路径可能组成任意数量的图形 （子路径）。A path may be composed of any number of figures (subpaths). 每个图或者组成的一系列连接的直线和曲线或几何形状基元。Each figure is either composed of a sequence of connected lines and curves or a geometric shape primitive. 图的起始点是序列中的连接的直线和曲线的第一个点。The starting point of a figure is the first point in the sequence of connected lines and curves. 结束点是在序列中的最后一个点。The ending point is the last point in the sequence. 由基元规范定义的几何形状基元的起始和结束点。The starting and ending points of a geometric shape primitive are defined by the primitive specification. 一个图，它由一系列连接的直线和曲线 （其起始和结束点可以是同一） 是开放的图形，除非显式关闭。A figure that consists of a sequence of connected lines and curves (whose starting and ending points may be coincident) is an open figure, unless it is closed explicitly. 可以通过使用显式，关闭图方法，这会关闭当前图通过将行从终结点连接到的起始点。A figure can be closed explicitly, by using the method, which closes the current figure by connecting a line from the ending point to the starting point. 包含几何形状基元图是闭合的图形。A figure that consists of a geometric shape primitive is a closed figure. 出于填充和剪辑的目的 (例如，如果使用呈现路径)，所有打开图形闭合通过将行从图的第一个点添加到其终结点。For purposes of filling and clipping (for example, if a path is rendered using ), all open figures are closed by adding a line from the figure's first point to its last point. 时创建路径，或者关闭图时，将隐式启动一个新图形。A new figure is implicitly started when a path is created or when a figure is closed. 时，显式将创建一个新图形调用方法。A new figure is explicitly created when the method is called. 几何形状基元添加到路径，它将添加包含的几何形状图，并同样隐式开始一个新图形。When a geometric shape primitive is added to a path, it adds a figure containing the geometric shape, and also implicitly starts a new figure. 因此，没有始终在当前图形路径中。Consequently, there is always a current figure in a path. 直线和曲线被添加到路径中，根据需要连接到新的直线和曲线以形成一系列连接的直线和曲线的起始点的当前图的结束点被添加隐式行。When lines and curves are added to a path, an implicit line is added as needed to connect the ending point of the current figure to the starting point of the new lines and curves to form a sequence of connected lines and curves. 图都有描述直线和曲线的段的起始点和结束点之间的跟踪方式的方向。A figure has a direction that describes how line and curve segments are traced between the starting point and the ending point. 方向是直线和曲线添加到图中，或定义的几何形状基元与订单中定义的。The direction is defined in the order that lines and curves are added to a figure, or is defined by the geometric shape primitive. 方向用于确定剪辑和填充的路径内部。The direction is used in determining the path interiors for clipping and fill.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddArc (System.Drawing.Rectangle rect, float startAngle, float sweepAngle);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddArc(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect, float32 startAngle, float32 sweepAngle) cil managed
Public Sub AddArc (rect As Rectangle, startAngle As Single, sweepAngle As Single)
public: void AddArc(System::Drawing::Rectangle rect, float startAngle, float sweepAngle);

param.name: rect
param.span: 一个 ，表示从中截取弧线的椭圆的矩形边界。

span.span: A that represents the rectangular bounds of the ellipse from which the arc is taken.

param.name: startAngle
param.span: 弧线的起始角度，以度为单位从 X 轴顺时针测量。

span.span: The starting angle of the arc, measured in degrees clockwise from the x-axis.

param.name: sweepAngle
param.span: startAngle 和弧线末尾之间的角度。

span.span: The angle between startAngle and the end of the arc.

summary.span: 向当前图形追加一段椭圆弧。

span.span: Appends an elliptical arc to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有以前的行或图中的曲线，添加行以连接到弧线的开头的前一条线段的终结点。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the beginning of the arc. 圆弧会沿受指定的矩形的椭圆外围进行跟踪。The arc is traced along the perimeter of the ellipse bounded by the specified rectangle. 通过从 （从 0 度角度看） 椭圆的 x 轴沿顺时针方向度量的起始角度的度数确定弧线的起始点。The starting point of the arc is determined by measuring clockwise from the x-axis of the ellipse (at the 0-degree angle) by the number of degrees in the start angle. 通过从起始点沿顺时针方向度量的中扫描角度度数位于同样到终结点。The endpoint is similarly located by measuring clockwise from the starting point by the number of degrees in the sweep angle. 如果大于 360 度或小于-360 度扫描角度，是分别将弧线扫频完全 360 度或-360 度。If the sweep angle is greater than 360 degrees or less than -360 degrees, the arc is swept by exactly 360 degrees or -360 degrees, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个矩形，从中定义圆弧。Creates a rectangle, from which the arc is defined. - 创建一个路径， `myPath`。Creates a path, `myPath`. - 定义为 180 度的椭圆弧的从 0 度扫描到 180 度，并将其追加到的路径。Defines a 180-degree elliptical arc that sweeps from 0 degrees to 180 degrees and appends it to a path. - 绘制到屏幕的路径。Draws the path to screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次方曲线通过使用第二个和第三个点为控制点构造从第一个点到四个点。The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points. 如果没有上一行或图中的曲线线段，添加一条线连接到三次方曲线的起始点的前一条线段的终结点。If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 三次方曲线通过使用第二个和第三个点为控制点构造从第一个点到四个点。The cubic curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point by using the second and third points as control points. 如果没有上一行或图中的曲线线段，添加一条线连接到三次方曲线的起始点的前一条线段的终结点。If there is a previous line or curve segment in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the cubic curve. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

param.name: points
param.span: 一个 结构的数组，它表示定义曲线的点。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curves.

summary.span: 在当前图形中添加一系列相互连接的立方贝塞尔曲线。

span.span: Adds a sequence of connected cubic Bézier curves to the current figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `points`参数指定终结点的数组和控制的连接的曲线的点。The `points` parameter specifies an array of endpoints and control points of the connected curves. 第一条曲线的第一个点从构造中的第四个点`points`为控制点使用第二个和第三个点的数组。The first curve is constructed from the first point to the fourth point in the `points` array by using the second and third points as control points. 前一条曲线的终结点，除了序列中的每个后续曲线需要完全三个点： 序列中的下两个点是控点和第三个是添加曲线的终结点。In addition to the endpoint of the previous curve, each subsequent curve in the sequence needs exactly three more points: the next two points in the sequence are control points, and the third is the endpoint for the added curve. 如果没有以前的行或图中的曲线，添加一个行以连接到序列中的第一个三次曲线的起始点的前一条线段的终结点。If there are previous lines or curves in the figure, a line is added to connect the endpoint of the previous segment to the starting point of the first cubic curve in the sequence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个数组 （表示两个连接的贝塞尔曲线） 的七个点。Creates an array of seven points (representing two connected Bézier curves). - 创建一个路径，并向该路径中添加的一系列贝塞尔曲线点。Creates a path and adds the series of Bézier curve points to the path. - 绘制到屏幕的路径。Draws the path to screen. span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddClosedCurve (System.Drawing.Point[] points);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddClosedCurve(valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] points) cil managed
Public Sub AddClosedCurve (points As Point())
public: void AddClosedCurve(cli::array <System::Drawing::Point> ^ points);

param.name: points
param.span: 一个 结构的数组，它表示定义曲线的点。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curve.

summary.span: 向此路径添加一个闭合曲线。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 由于曲线经过数组中的每个点，因此使用基数样条曲线。

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的点转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线控制点内部，因此没有任何机制可返回原始的点。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一个点和中的最后一个点`points`数组不是相同的点，通过连接这两个点来闭合曲线。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. 张力值不能设置为此方法，默认值为 0.5 的值相等。The tension value cannot be set for this method, and defaults to a value equivalent to 0.5. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

public: void AddClosedCurve(cli::array <System::Drawing::Point> ^ points, float tension);

param.name: points
param.span: 一个 结构的数组，它表示定义曲线的点。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points that define the curve.

param.name: tension
param.span: 介于 0 到 1 之间的一个值，它指定曲线在点与点之间弯曲的程度，0 表示最小弯曲（最锐拐角），1 表示最平滑弯曲。

span.span: A value between from 0 through 1 that specifies the amount that the curve bends between points, with 0 being the smallest curve (sharpest corner) and 1 being the smoothest curve.

summary.span: 向此路径添加一个闭合曲线。

span.span: Adds a closed curve to this path.

summary.span: 由于曲线经过数组中的每个点，因此使用基数样条曲线。

span.span: A cardinal spline curve is used because the curve travels through each of the points in the array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的点转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线控制点内部，因此没有任何机制可返回原始的点。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 如果第一个点和中的最后一个点`points`数组不是相同的点，通过连接这两个点来闭合曲线。If the first point and the last point in the `points` array are not the same point, the curve is closed by connecting these two points. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个数组 （表示的基数样条） 的六个点。Creates an array of six points (representing a cardinal spline). - 创建一个路径，并将闭合基数样条曲线添加到 （关闭从终结点到的起始点） 的路径。Creates a path and adds the closed cardinal spline curves to the path (closed from the endpoint to the starting point). - 绘制到屏幕的路径。Draws the path to screen. 请注意，使用 0.5 的张力。Notice that a tension of 0.5 is used. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的点转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线控制点内部，因此没有任何机制可返回原始的点。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 曲线以指定数组中的点开始`offset`参数包括由指定的点 （段） 的数量和`numberOfSegments`。The curve begins at the point in the array specified by the `offset` parameter and includes the number of points (segments) specified by `numberOfSegments`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个数组 （表示的基数样条） 的四个点。Creates an array of four points (representing a cardinal spline). - 创建一个路径，并使用点的数组，将曲线添加到路径。Creates a path and using the array of points, adds the curve to the path. - 绘制到屏幕的路径。Draws the path to the screen. 注意，尽管数组具有四个点，有一些只有三个段，这是对的调用的第三个参数中指定的数字。Notice that while the array holds four points, there are only three segments, which is the number specified in the third argument of the call to . remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的点`points`数组指定的多边形的顶点。The points in the `points` array specify the vertices of a polygon. 如果数组中的第一个点不是最后一个点相同，这两个点都连接到关闭多边形。If the first point in the array is not the same as the last point, those two points are connected to close the polygon. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建定义多边形的点数组。Creates an array of points that defines a polygon. - 创建一个路径，并向该路径添加多边形。Creates a path and adds the polygon to the path. - 绘制到屏幕的路径。Draws the path to the screen. First, notice that the `fontStyle` argument is cast as an integer. 方法需要这因此两个或多个成员可结合使用来创建所需的字体样式 (在这种情况下，和)。The method requires this so that two or more members can be combined to create the desired font style (in this case, and ). 其次，请注意，使用方法而不是方法。Secondly, notice that the method is used rather than the method. 如果使用时，呈现纯文本，而如果是使用，文本将是某种边框样式。If is used, solid text is rendered, whereas if is used, the text will be an outline style. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径和平移矩阵。Creates a graphics path and a translation matrix. - 将曲线添加到使用四个点的路径。Adds a curve to the path using four points. - 向屏幕中，使用黑色钢笔绘制的路径 （曲线）。Draws the path (curve) to the screen, using a black pen. - 将该曲线下移 10 个像素并展平它。Shifts the curve down 10 pixels and flattens it. - 向屏幕使用红色钢笔绘制曲线。Draws the curve to the screen using, a red pen. 请注意红色的曲线具有平展行连接的点。Notice that the red curve has flattened lines connecting the points. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#19)]

summary.span: 返回限定此 的矩形。

span.span: Returns a rectangle that bounds this .

returns.span: 一个 ，表示限定此 的矩形。

span.span: A that represents a rectangle that bounds this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的边框的大小会影响端帽、 钢笔的宽度，和钢笔斜接限制的类型，并因此生成"松配合"于被限定路径。The size of the returned bounding rectangle is influenced by the type of end caps, pen width, and pen miter limit, and therefore produces a "loose fit" to the bounded path. 近似公式是： 初始边界矩形被放大钢笔的宽度，并且此结果乘以斜接限制，以及一些其他的边距，以容纳端帽。The approximate formula is: the initial bounding rectangle is inflated by pen width, and this result is multiplied by the miter limit, plus some additional margin to allow for end caps. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 向它添加一个椭圆 (circle)，并将其绘制到屏幕。Adds an ellipse (circle) to it and draws it to the screen. - 检索对的调用带有圆圈的边界矩形和向屏幕绘制的矩形。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the circle with a call to and draws the rectangle to the screen. - 创建第二个的图形路径。Creates a second graphics path. - 添加一个圆形和扩大的宽度为 10 的路径。Adds a circle and widens the path to a width of 10. - 绘制到屏幕的路径。Draws the path to the screen. - 检索第二个圆的绑定矩形。Retrieves the bounding rectangle for the second circle. - 向屏幕绘制的边框。Draws the bounding rectangle to the screen. - 在对话框中显示的矩形大小。Displays the rectangle size in a dialog box. 请注意，在右侧的边框是更大 （到行的多余的宽度的帐户）。Notice that the bounding rectangle on the right is larger (to account for the extra width of the line). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#20)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过返回的字节数组属性路径中指定点类型以及数据点的标志。The array of bytes returned by the property specifies point types and flags for the data points in a path. 对于每个点，位 0 到 2 指示一个点的类型和 3 到 7 位保留一组指定的点属性的标志。For each point, bits 0 through 2 indicate the type of a point, and bits 3 through 7 hold a set of flags that specify the attributes of a point. 下表显示可能的值以及它们的含义。The following table shows possible values and their meanings. |“值”Value|含义Meaning| |-----------|-------------| |00|指示点是一个数字的开始。Indicates that the point is the start of a figure.| |11|指示此点是一条线的两个终结点之一。Indicates that the point is one of the two endpoints of a line.| |33|指示点是终结点或控件点的三次方贝塞尔样条。Indicates that the point is an endpoint or control point of a cubic Bézier spline.| |0x70x7|屏蔽指示的 point 类型的三个低顺序位之外的所有位。Masks all bits except for the three low-order bits, which indicate the point type.| |0x200x20|指定点是一个标记。Specifies that the point is a marker.| |0x800x80|指定此点是封闭的子路径 （图） 中的最后一个点。Specifies that the point is the last point in a closed subpath (figure).|

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径，并将几个基元添加到路径。Creates a path and adds several primitives to the path. - 向屏幕绘制的路径的点数组。Draws the path's points array to the screen. - 向屏幕绘制反转后的点数组。Draws the reversed points array to the screen. 请注意，从第一个点的第二个列表是按相反的顺序。Notice that the second listing of points is in reverse order from the first. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#25](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#25)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#25](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#25)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#25](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#25)]

summary.span: 在此 上设置标记。

span.span: Sets a marker on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于分隔的路径部分路径上创建一个标记。This method creates a marker on the path that can be used to separate sections of the path. 然后，可以使用方法以循环访问路径中的标记。You can then use the methods to iterate through the markers in the path. 标记用于分隔的子路径的组。Markers are used to separate groups of subpaths. 可以在路径中的两个标记之间包含一个或多个子路径。One or more subpaths can be contained between two markers in the path. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码创建一个路径和将几个基元添加到由标记分隔的路径并绘制到屏幕的路径。The code creates a path and adds several primitives to the path separated by markers, and draws the path to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#26)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#26)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#26](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#26)]

summary.span: 不闭合当前图形即开始一个新图形。

span.span: Starts a new figure without closing the current figure.

summary.span: 后面添加到该路径的所有点都被添加到此新图形中。

span.span: All subsequent points added to the path are added to this new figure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要则用户必须保留原始的点。The user must keep the original points if they are needed. 原始的点转换为三次方贝塞尔曲线控制点内部，因此没有任何机制可返回原始的点。The original points are converted to cubic Bézier control points internally, therefore there is no mechanism for returning the original points. 此方法会启动新的子路径的路径中。This method starts a new subpath in the path. 子路径使您能够将一个路径部分分成和使用类以循环访问这些子路径。Subpaths allow you to separate a path into sections and use the class to iterate through the subpaths. ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径。Creates a path. - 将添加两个图形集。Adds two sets of figures. 第一组数字将四个基元合并到两个图片。The first set of figures combines four primitives into two figures. 第二组数字将合并相同的四个基元 （只不过它们在 y 轴偏移量） 到三个数字。The second set of figures combines the same four primitives (except that they are offset in the y-axis) into three figures. - 向屏幕绘制所有的数据。Draws all the figures to the screen. 请注意外观的数字的两个集之间的区别。Notice the difference in the appearance between the two sets of figures. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#27)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#27)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#27](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#27)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换可以缩放、 翻译、 旋转或扭曲。The transformation can scale, translate, rotate, or skew the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个路径，并向该路径中添加一个椭圆。Creates a path and adds an ellipse to the path. - 向屏幕绘制路径。Draws path to the screen. - 创建转换路径 100 个单位中的 x 轴方向的转换矩阵。Creates a transform matrix to translate the path 100 units in the x-axis direction. - 向屏幕绘制转换后的路径。Draws the transformed path to the screen. 请注意，原始椭圆绘制为黑色，并以红色绘制变换后的椭圆。Notice that the original ellipse is drawn in black and the transformed ellipse is drawn in red. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/CS/form1.cs#28)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathExamples/VB/form1.vb#28)]
